Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Player extends Object implements Serializable
This class is the representation of a playing client in the game model. It holds all the data unique to each player in a match, such as their nickname, their wizardID, the Assistant Cards they still have and their school. If the match is being played in Expert mode, other useful data (otherwise present but unused), such as the coins' wallet and a flag that is true if the player has already played a Character Card in a round, will be accessed and updated.
See Also:

    • resetLatestAssistantCardPlayed

      public void resetLatestAssistantCardPlayed()
      Resets (sets back to null) the attribute latestAssistantCardPlayed so that the game controller can properly handle the Planning Phase (when deciding if a player can - or cannot - play a specific Assistant Card).

    • getCharacterCardAlreadyPlayed

      public boolean getCharacterCardAlreadyPlayed()
      Checks if the player has already played a Character Card in the current round.
      Returns:
      true if the player has, false otherwise.

    • setCharacterCardAlreadyPlayed

      public void setCharacterCardAlreadyPlayed(boolean characterCardAlreadyPlayed)
      Updates the boolean flag to true if the player has just played a Character Card, to false if a new round has just begun.
      Parameters:
      characterCardAlreadyPlayed - the new flag.

    • playAssistantCard

      public void playAssistantCard(String cardName)
      Finds the chosen card in the deck, sets the latestAssistantCardPlayed accordingly and removes it from the player's deck. The game controller won't call this method if it finds out that the chosen card can't be played.
      Parameters:
      cardName - the name of the card the player has chosen to play.

    • getAssistantCardFromName

      public AssistantCard getAssistantCardFromName(String cardName)
      Returns the AssistantCard in the player's deck whose name is identical to the one provided as a parameter.
      Parameters:
      cardName - the Assistant Card's name.
      Returns:
      the desired card.

    • moveStudent

      public void moveStudent(Island island, String color) throws StudentNotFoundException
      Moves a student of the chosen color to the chosen island, if possible.
      Parameters:
      island - the island to move the student to.
      color - the color of the student to move.
      Throws:
      StudentNotFoundException - if a student of the chosen color does not exist in the player's hall.

    • moveStudent

      public void moveStudent(String color) throws StudentNotFoundException, NonExistentColorException, FullTableException
      Moves a student of the chosen color to the proper table in the player's School.
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the student to move.
      Throws:
      StudentNotFoundException - if a student of the chosen color does not exist in the player's hall.
      NonExistentColorException - if a non-existent color is somehow provided (view input controls should prevent this exception to be thrown).
      FullTableException - if the table of the chosen color is full.

    • showSchool

      public void showSchool()
      Allows the CLI to properly show the player's school.
